_description: This file defines speaker roles and operation sensitivity levels for voiceprint-based access control

sensitive_operations._comment_critical: Critical operations require owner role + two-factor confirmation
sensitive_operations._comment_medium: Medium operations require voiceprint verification (owner or guest)
